00013 VoIPPacketsManager::VoIPPacketsManager(Config* cfg) {
00014         config = cfg;
00015         lastReadByte = 0;
00016         readAudioDataFileToMem();
00017

00033 vector<char> VoIPPacketsManager::getAudioDataToSend() {
00034         int size = config->RTPPayloadSize;
00035         vector<char> ret;
00036         for (int i=1; i<size; i++) ret.push_back(audioData[(++lastReadByte) % audioData.size()]);
00037         lastReadByte = lastReadByte % audioData.size();
00038         return ret;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void VoIPPacketsManager::readAudioDataFileToMem() {
00042         ifstream f(config->audioFilePath.c_str(), ios::in|ios::binary|ios::ate);
00043         if (f.is_open()) {
00044                 f.seekg(0, ios::beg);
00045                 while (! f.eof() ) {
00046                         char c;
00047                         f.get(c);
00048                         audioData.push_back(c);
00049                 }
00050                 f.close();
00051         }
00052         else Main::getInstance()->handleError("Can't open the audio input file: "+config->audioFilePath);
00053 }
